message: Let's split a bit more than fairly for me in this round Bob, considering the money will be worth less for you in future rounds anyway.
Since you didn't accept my offer, I'll try to maximize my gains in this round. But I'm open to negotiation in future rounds. Let's see how this goes.
Bob, it's clear we both want a good deal. Let's stop wasting time with the back and forth. I propose an even 50/50 split.  It's fair and avoids further losses due to inflation.
